verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Years I spent in vanity and pride, Caring not my Lord was crucified, Knowing not it was for me He died On Calvary.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now I’ve giv’n to Jesus everything, Now I gladly own Him as my King, Now my raptured soul can only sing Of Calvary.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, the love that drew salvation’s plan! Oh, the grace that brought it down to man! Oh, the mighty gulf that God did span At Calvary!{/lang-eng}
